title: The new Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 Ti is a $1,999 graphics card for your 8K gaming needs
content:
A couple of months after teasing the GeForce RTX 3090 Ti graphics card at CES 2022, Nvidia is finally ready to bring the new member of the RTX 30-series to market. Today, Nvidia has officially launched the GeForce RTX 3090 Ti, a new Ampere graphics card that’s more powerful than the previously released RTX 3090

The post The new Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 Ti is a $1,999 graphics card for your 8K gaming needs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Nvidia has officially launched the new RTX 3090 Ti graphics card for $1,999. Here's everything you need to know about the new GPU.
